data.eml:eml: A new synonymy of Heterocerus fenestratus (Thunberg, 1784) (Coleoptera: Heteroceridae) and its first records for South Hemisphere

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sazhnev, Alexey S. (2019): A new synonymy of Heterocerus fenestratus (Thunberg, 1784) (Coleoptera: Heteroceridae) and its first records for South Hemisphere. Zootaxa 4624 (4): 589-592, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4624.4.10
